text: Ni kan taiyang chulai de shihou, cong tamen de shandong de youbian xieshe guoqu; taiyang luoshan de shihou, cong tamen de zuobian xieshe guoqu, tongshi tamen jiu zai shandong de kong chu. Zhe shi zhenzhu de yi zhong jixiang, zhenzhu yindao shei, shei zunxun zhengdao; zhenzhu shi shei mi wu, ni jue buneng wei shei faxian renhe pengyou zuowei yindao zhe
